DOC.brief_summary: The role of a sciatic block in addition to a femoral block remains controversial. The study addresses this topic by comparing a continuous block versus an injection on demand.
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Versus Intermittent Sciatic Block for Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: Patients scheduled for total knee arthroplasty failure to establish femoral and sciatic block insufficient analgesic effect of the block patient declines to participate
